item7.lore:
Hardened Wood
&8Reforge Stone
&7&8Combinable in Reforge Anvil

&7Applies the &9Stiff &7reforge when
&7combined with a fishing rod&7.

&9Stiff &7(&6Legendary&7):
&7Strength: &c+10
&7Sea Creature Chance: &c+5%

&7Requires &aMining Skill Level XII&7!

&a&lUNCOMMON REFORGE STONE&r

&7Cost
&615,000 Coins

item9.lore:
Golden Ball
&8Reforge Stone
&7&8Combinable in Reforge Anvil

&7crops.
&7Grants &6+0.2 coins &7per crop.
